questions.question: What is your gender?
questions.clinical_rationale: Essential demographic information for accurate medical assessment

questions.question: What is your age category?
questions.clinical_rationale: Age-specific medical assessment and treatment considerations

questions.question: Does the infant have a persistent cough?
Is the cough accompanied by fever?
Does the infant have difficulty breathing?
Is the cough wet or productive?
Does the infant have nasal congestion?
Is the infant's cough worse at night?
Is the infant wheezing while coughing?
Has the infant been exposed to smoke or pollutants?
Does the infant have a history of allergies?
Does the infant vomit after coughing?
Is the infant feeding normally despite the cough?
Has the infant been recently vaccinated?
Does the child have a persistent cough?
Is the cough accompanied by a sore throat?
Does the child have a fever along with the cough?
Is the cough dry or productive?
Does the child experience chest pain while coughing?
Does the child have a runny nose?
Is the cough worse in the morning or at night?
Does the child have a history of asthma or allergies?
Does the child cough after physical activity?
Has the child been exposed to someone with a cold or flu?
Does the child have difficulty sleeping due to the cough?
Has the child recently traveled to a high-pollution area?
Does the teenager have a persistent cough?
Is the cough accompanied by shortness of breath?
Does the teenager have a fever along with the cough?
Does the cough produce mucus or phlegm?
Does the teenager smoke or vape?
Does the teenager have chest pain while coughing?
Is the cough triggered by exercise or cold air?
Does the teenager have a history of asthma or bronchitis?
Has the teenager been exposed to allergens recently?
Does the male teenager have a hoarse voice with the cough?
Does the male teenager experience wheezing while coughing?
Does the male teenager have a family history of respiratory illnesses?
Does the female teenager have a persistent dry cough?
Does the female teenager experience fatigue along with the cough?
Does the female teenager have a history of allergies?
Does the adult have a persistent cough lasting more than 3 weeks?
Is the cough accompanied by blood in the mucus?
Does the adult have a fever along with the cough?
Is the cough worse after lying down?
Does the adult have a history of smoking?
Does the adult experience shortness of breath with the cough?
Is the cough triggered by cold air or exercise?
Does the adult have a history of asthma or chronic bronchitis?
Has the adult been exposed to allergens recently?
Does the male adult have a hoarse voice with the cough?
Does the male adult experience wheezing while coughing?
Does the male adult have a family history of respiratory illnesses?
Does the female adult have a persistent dry cough?
Does the female adult experience fatigue along with the cough?
Does the female adult have a history of allergies?
Does the middle-aged adult have a persistent cough lasting more than 3 weeks?
Is the cough accompanied by blood in the mucus?
Does the middle-aged adult have a fever along with the cough?
Is the cough worse after lying down?
Does the middle-aged adult have a history of smoking?
Does the middle-aged adult experience shortness of breath with the cough?
Is the cough triggered by cold air or exercise?
Does the middle-aged adult have a history of asthma or chronic bronchitis?
Has the middle-aged adult been exposed to allergens recently?
Does the male middle-aged adult have a hoarse voice with the cough?
Does the male middle-aged adult experience wheezing while coughing?
Does the male middle-aged adult have a family history of respiratory illnesses?
Does the female middle-aged adult have a persistent dry cough?
Does the female middle-aged adult experience fatigue along with the cough?
Does the female middle-aged adult have a history of allergies?
Does the elderly adult have a persistent cough lasting more than 3 weeks?
Is the cough accompanied by blood in the mucus?
Does the elderly adult have a fever along with the cough?
Is the cough worse after lying down?
Does the elderly adult have a history of smoking?
Does the elderly adult experience shortness of breath with the cough?
Is the cough triggered by cold air or exercise?
Does the elderly adult have a history of asthma or chronic bronchitis?
Has the elderly adult been exposed to allergens recently?
Does the elderly male have a hoarse voice with the cough?
Does the elderly male experience wheezing while coughing?
Does the elderly male have a family history of respiratory illnesses?
Does the elderly female have a persistent dry cough?
Does the elderly female experience fatigue along with the cough?
Does the elderly female have a history of allergies?

diagnosis.title: Bronchiolitis
diagnosis.description: A common lung infection in infants causing cough and wheezing.

diagnosis.title: Croup
diagnosis.description: A viral infection causing a barking cough and stridor in young children.

diagnosis.title: RSV Infection
diagnosis.description: A respiratory virus causing cold-like symptoms in infants.

diagnosis.title: Pneumonia
diagnosis.description: Lung infection causing fever, cough, and difficulty breathing.

diagnosis.title: Allergic Rhinitis
diagnosis.description: Allergy-induced nasal congestion and cough.

diagnosis.title: Whooping Cough (Pertussis)
diagnosis.description: A bacterial infection causing severe coughing fits.

diagnosis.title: Common Cold
diagnosis.description: A viral infection causing mild cough and nasal congestion.

diagnosis.title: Asthma
diagnosis.description: Chronic inflammation of airways causing cough and wheezing.

diagnosis.title: Sinusitis
diagnosis.description: Inflammation of sinuses causing cough and nasal discharge.

diagnosis.title: Flu (Influenza)
diagnosis.description: Viral infection causing fever, cough, and body aches.

diagnosis.title: GERD
diagnosis.description: Acid reflux causing cough, especially at night.

diagnosis.title: Foreign Body Aspiration
diagnosis.description: Inhalation of a foreign object causing sudden cough.

diagnosis.title: Allergic Rhinitis
diagnosis.description: Allergy-induced nasal congestion and cough.

diagnosis.title: Bronchitis
diagnosis.description: Inflammation of the bronchial tubes causing cough.

diagnosis.title: Asthma
diagnosis.description: Chronic inflammation of airways causing cough and wheezing.
